front.title: Remote Direct Memory Access Transport for Remote Procedure Call

abstract.t: This document specifies a protocol for conveying Remote Procedure Call (RPC) messages on physical transports capable of Remote Direct Memory Access (RDMA). The RDMA transport binding enables efficient bulk-data transport over high-speed networks with minimal change to RPC applications. It requires no revision to application RPC protocols or the RPC protocol itself. This document obsoletes RFC 5666.
